commit message: Possibly fix NPE in error handling

Add preference to hide buffer topic in list

Closes #58.

Update Readme.md

Changed references to point to the google play store.

Hook buffer clear commands in client

Hooks the commands /CL and /buffer clear to clear the chat window in the
android app when clearing the screen server side.  Doesn't work if you
use a different alias.

Partial fix for #9

Add tap+hold menu for copying message text

When viewing a buffer, you can now tap and hold on a line to copy the
text.  If the line contains url's, you can copy them separately as well.

Fixes #60.

Allow filtering of the buffer list

Add textbox to filter the buffer list by title
New preference to hide/show the filter text box

Fixes #51

Change default for showing buffer filter

Default changed to be hidden.
